topic.title: Learn Chinese With Mike - 100 videos - 2.7GB
topic.body:
Learn Chinese With Mike - Chinese Language Learning Course (Video Course, Mandarin, Pinyin) MP4

Some trackers to add:


See `Learn Chinese with Mike.txt` for additional learning material

The quality of the above torrent isn't too good, but [this 16GB torrent](https://torrentproject.se/c9b72ac44c740b9c3fe06e26cc0635bc65738487/Chinese-with-Mike-torrent.html) doesn't have many seeders ...
